intro: Elatostema tutuilense, commonly known as the New Caledonian snowflake plant, is a species of flowering plant native to the island of New Caledonia. It belongs to the family Urticaceae, which includes nettle and related plants. The plant is characterized by its small, white flowers and hairy, oval-shaped leaves. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments within the tropical rainforests of New Caledonia. Elatostema tutuilense is known for its unique morphology and is of interest to botanists studying plant adaptation in isolated ecosystems.
